source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_00<tab>The look on Serpent Marshal Brookstone's face suggests he has grown tired of waiting.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_00<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのスウェスリク大牙将は、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_01<tab>You and the serpent marshal have been waiting on Lieutenant Molkoh for what feels an eternity. Certain she has finished, he asks you to check on her to see what information, if any, could be obtained from the detainee.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_01<tab>スウェスリク大牙将と話した。ギラバニア辺境地帯のカストルム・オリエンスにいる「タラ・モルコー少牙士」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_02<tab>The lieutenant's talk with the detainee was uneventful. The only thing he is certain of, is that he escaped from Garlean captivity. If he is one of the missing prisoners remains to be seen. Thinking back to where they discovered him, she is convinced the imperial soldiers you recently encountered are related. She rushes to speak with Serpent Marshal Brookstone in the hopes of assembling a unit to apprehend them.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_02<tab>タラ・モルコー少牙士と話した。ビターミルで逃がした帝国兵を探して、山狩りを行うことになった。カストルム・オリエンスの「スウェスリク大牙将」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_03<tab>Not one to leave anything to chance, the serpent marshal has already dispatched men in search of the soldiers you encountered. Unfortunately, he lacks the manpower to cover all of the Fringes, and is deliberating on how to set about investigating Owyn's Stash. Lieutenant Molkoh readily volunteers on her, and your, behalf, then quickly rushes off to the cave.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_03<tab>スウェスリク大牙将と話した。オウェンの酒蔵にいる「タラ・モルコー少牙士」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_04<tab>You find Lieutenant Molkoh at the cave entrance, her enthusiasm replaced with growing reluctance. She sticks close behind as you make your way into Owyn's Stash.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_04<tab>タラ・モルコー少牙士と話した。オウェンの酒蔵で逃げた帝国兵を探して、「タラ・モルコー少牙士」と再度合流しよう

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_05<tab>Deep within the cave you find a Garlean soldier, and he's gravely injured. Lieutenant Molkoh bids you return to Castrum Oriens for assistance while she stays with your new captive.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_05<tab>捜索中の、体格のいい帝国兵を発見した。カストルム・オリエンスの「スウェスリク大牙将」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_06<tab>Without a moment's hesitation, Serpent Marshal Brookstone orders his men to converge on Owyn's Stash to see the captured soldier safely back to Castrum Oriens. Soon you may finally have answers to the whereabouts of the missing prisoners.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SEQ_06<tab>スウェスリク大牙将と話した。体格のいい帝国兵を連れ帰るための、人員を回してくれるようだ。タラ・モルコー少牙士の帰還を待とう。
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TODO_00<tab>タラ・モルコー少牙士と話す
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TODO_01<tab>スウェスリク大牙将と話す
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TODO_02<tab>タラ・モルコー少牙士と合流
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TODO_03<tab>タラ・モルコー少牙士と再度合流
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TODO_04<tab>スウェスリク大牙将と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_001<tab>I imagine Lieutenant Molkoh has finished questioning the detainee by now. Go and see what, if anything, she's learned.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_001<tab>……「タラ・モルコー少牙士」の聞き取りも終わった頃だろう。
彼女から話を聞いて、適切に対応してくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_010<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I've just finished with questioning.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_010<tab>おや、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
たった今、男性の話を聞き終えたところです。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_011<tab>Unfortunately, he can recall absolutely nothing of his past. The only thing he's certain of, is that he escaped from Garlean captivity. I'm beginning to believe he really is one of the missing prisoners.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_011<tab>やはり記憶を失っているらしく、素性はわかりませんでした。
ですが、最近まで帝国軍に捕らえられていたというのです。
どうやら、本当に捕虜だった方のようですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_012<tab>But where does Bittermill fit into all of this? I fear we've reached an impasse. It's not as if we can ask the Garleans what they were doing there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_012<tab>男性とビターミルの関係はわからないままです。
これ以上の情報を得るとなると、
それこそ帝国人から聞き出すしか…………はっ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_013<tab>...Or perhaps we can! The soldier who escaped us earlier must know something to have been prowling about the area. He has to be taken into custody.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_013<tab>ビターミルで撃退した帝国兵！
逃げ出してしまいましたが、探し出して捕まえれば、
何か情報を得られるかもしれません！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_014<tab>Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we must speak with Serpent Marshal Brookstone about assembling a search party. No stone can be left unturned!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_014<tab>「スウェスリク大牙将」に頼んで、
逃げた帝国兵を探す部隊を編成してもらいましょう。
山狩りの……始まりです！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_015<tab>Would you go and see what's keeping Lieutenant Molkoh? I very much doubt she could pry much information out of that man, daft as he was.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_015<tab>……「タラ・モルコー少牙士」の聞き取りも終わった頃だろう。
彼女から話を聞いて、適切に対応してくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_020<tab>You wish to capture the soldier you encountered at Bittermill?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_020<tab>君たちがビターミルで遭遇した帝国兵を捕まえてほしい、と？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_021<tab>Well, you should know I've already dispatched a reconnaissance team. After reading Lieutenant Molkoh's report, I thought it prudent he be apprehended immediately. However, therein lies the rub.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_021<tab>……実は、タラ少牙士の報告を受けた直後から、
追跡部隊を派遣して、行方は追っているのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_022<tab>We lack the manpower to sufficiently survey the area. In fact, I was just deliberating over who I should call back to make a sweep of Owyn's Stash.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_022<tab>しかし、捜索範囲の広大さに比べ、人員は不足している。
現に「オウェンの酒蔵」と呼ばれる洞窟の周辺には、
まだ部隊を派遣できていない。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_023<tab>There's no need for that, sir. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I will go. I realize I'm not the ideal scout to assist in this, but we have to find them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_023<tab>それなら、私たちが行きます。
肉体労働は不得手ですが、情報のためなら仕方ありません。
「オウェンの酒蔵」前で合流しましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_025<tab>That soldier is the key to finding the missing prisoners. I just know it!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_025<tab>情報を得るために、なんとしても逃げた帝国兵を捕まえなければ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_030<tab>On your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have a bad feeling about this place.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_030<tab>この奥から、人の気配がします……。
気をつけて進みましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_200_030<tab>With my men spread so thin, your help is greatly appreciated. Be careful out there at Owyn's Stash.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_200_030<tab>「オウェンの酒蔵」周辺には、まだ追跡部隊を派遣できていない。
君が力を貸してくれると助かる。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_031<tab>These wounds! If he's not treated soon, he won't be telling anyone anything.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_031<tab>この怪我では、話を聞けそうにありませんね。
カストルム・オリエンスに運び、治療しなければ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_032<tab>He's like to bleed out if left unattended. Go and tell Serpent Marshal Brookstone we've found him, and he needs medical assistance before he can be moved.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_032<tab>私は、この方が逃げないよう見張っています。
あなたは、「スウェスリク大牙将」に状況を説明し、
人手を送るよう頼んできてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_035<tab>We found him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We really found him!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_035<tab>こちらの方が、件の帝国兵のようですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_100_040<tab>My men have searched high and low, yet there is no sign of this runaway soldier.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_100_040<tab>追跡部隊からの新しい報告はない。
君の方はどうだ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_040<tab>You found him at Owyn's Stash!? Say no more.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_040<tab>なに……件の帝国兵を見つけたというのか？
了解した、すぐに人を回そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_041<tab>Attention. This is Brookstone speaking. The subject has been found at Owyn's Stash. I repeat, the subject has been found at Owyn's Stash. He is severely wounded and in need of medical attention.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_041<tab>捜索隊、聞こえるか。
対象の居場所が判明した。
すぐにオウェンの酒蔵へ向かえ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_042<tab>Excellent work. Perhaps now we can finally get to the bottom of all this Bittermill business.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_042<tab>……これでよし。
此度の働き、ご苦労だった。
君はここで、タラ・モルコー少牙士の帰りを待つといい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_050<tab>Please hurry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This man needs a healer.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ113_02663_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_050<tab>「スウェスリク大牙将」に、人を寄越すよう伝えてください。
よろしく頼みますよ。
